Blueprints

Account

File Description

File to manage the account page and its respective subpages. These pages contain general information about the store and help manage sales, profits, stock and other items.

account.login() → Response | str

Main login page for the project.

Returns

Returns either the rendering of the template for ‘login.html’ if the user does not already have a session, else returns a redirect to the dashboard page.

Return type

Response | str

account.logout() → Response

Logout pseudo-page to delete session data and redirect back to the login page.

Returns

Redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response

account.dashboard() → Response | str

Dashboard page where major / important information is displayed as cards.

Returns

If the user is logged in, rendering of the template for ‘dashboard.html’ else, a redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response | str

account.profile() → Response | str

Profile page where employee information is displayed.

Returns

If the user is logged in, rendering of the template for ‘dashboard.html’ else, a redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response | str

account.warehouse() → Response | str

Warehouse page where data related to medicines stored, their stock and sales made is shown as tables.

Returns

If the user is logged in, rendering of the template for ‘dashboard.html’ else, a redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response | str

account.warehouse_add_medicine() → Response | str

Add medicine page where new medicines for the database can be added using a form.

Returns

If the user is logged in, rendering of the template for ‘dashboard.html’ else, a redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response | str

account.warehouse_update_stock() → Response | str

Update stock page where stock of existing medicines can be updated using a form.

Returns

If the user is logged in, rendering of the template for ‘dashboard.html’ else, a redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response | str

account.warehouse_new_sale() → Response | str

New sale page where new sales can be logged using a form.

Returns

If the user is logged in, rendering of the template for ‘dashboard.html’ else, a redirect to the login page.

Return type

Response | str
